refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GBoxed ╰── MetaKeyBinding GObject ├── MetaDisplay ├── MetaScreen ├── MetaWindow ╰── MetaWorkspace

refsect2.title: The “above” property
refsect2.para: Whether the window is shown as always-on-top.

refsect2.title: The “appears-focused” property
refsect2.para: Whether the window is drawn as being focused.

refsect2.title: The “gtk-app-menu-object-path” property
refsect2.para: Contents of the _GTK_APP_MENU_OBJECT_PATH property of this window.

refsect2.title: The “gtk-application-id” property
refsect2.para: Contents of the _GTK_APPLICATION_ID property of this window.

refsect2.title: The “gtk-application-object-path” property
refsect2.para: Contents of the _GTK_APPLICATION_OBJECT_PATH property of this window.

refsect2.title: The “gtk-menubar-object-path” property
refsect2.para: Contents of the _GTK_MENUBAR_OBJECT_PATH property of this window.

refsect2.title: The “gtk-unique-bus-name” property
refsect2.para: Contents of the _GTK_UNIQUE_BUS_NAME property of this window.

refsect2.title: The “gtk-window-object-path” property
refsect2.para: Contents of the _GTK_WINDOW_OBJECT_PATH property of this window.

refsect2.title: The “muffin-hints” property
refsect2.para: Contents of the _MUFFIN_HINTS property of this window.

refsect2.title: The “progress” property
refsect2.para: The progress of some long-running operation.

refsect2.title: The “progress-pulse” property
refsect2.para: Show indeterminate or ongoing progress of an operation.

refsect2.title: The “resizeable” property
refsect2.para: Whether the window can be resized.

refsect2.title: The “tile-type” property
refsect2.para: Whether window is tiled or snapped.

refsect2.title: The “urgent” property
refsect2.para: Whether the urgent flag of WM_HINTS is set.

refsect2.title: The “wm-class” property
refsect2.para: Contents of the WM_CLASS property of this window.

refsect2.title: The “grab-op-begin” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaDisplay *metadisplay, MetaScreen *arg1, MetaWindow *arg2, MetaGrabOp arg3, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “grab-op-end” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaDisplay *metadisplay, MetaScreen *arg1, MetaWindow *arg2, MetaGrabOp arg3, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “restart” signal
refsect2.para: The ::restart signal is emitted to indicate that Muffin will restart the process.

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The “show-snap-osd” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, gint arg1, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “startup-sequence-changed” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, gpointer arg1, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “window-added” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, MetaWindow *arg1, gint arg2, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “window-entered-monitor” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, gint arg1, MetaWindow *arg2, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “window-left-monitor” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, gint arg1, MetaWindow *arg2, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “window-monitor-changed” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, MetaWindow *arg1, gint arg2, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “window-workspace-changed” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, MetaWindow *arg1, MetaWorkspace *arg2, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “workspace-added” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, gint arg1, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “workspace-removed” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, gint arg1, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “workspace-switched” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaScreen *metascreen, gint arg1, gint arg2, MetaMotionDirection arg3, gpointer user_data)

refsect2.title: The “workspace-changed” signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (MetaWindow *metawindow, gint arg1, gpointer user_data)
